department.ch: 工業管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch:
“存貨管理與採購是生產管理、倉儲管理、供應鏈管理、零售管理及商業活動上最重要的管理技術與企業功能之一。本課程介紹存貨管理與採購之基本概念、系統操作、數學模式及相關管理意涵與應用，主要內容包含：
-  存貨管理決策模式：經濟訂購量模型(EOQ)、經濟生產量模型(EPQ)、報童模式(Newsvendor)、數量折扣、採購與定價聯合決策、多階層產銷結構之策略聯盟與存貨模式、退貨模式、服務性商品(例如機位)之存貨管理、產品替代性與互補性模式、整合物流系統之存貨模式以及衰退性物品(Perishable item)之存貨管理；
-  存貨管理與採購系統：SAP-R/3材料管理模組(MM module) 介紹、實習及上機；
-  採購與外包：企業採購、B2B電子市集採購、競標採購(Auction)、採購合約設計(Contract design)、採購機制設計(Mechanism design; e.g., auction)、外包(outsourcing)、虛擬策略(Virtual Strategy)及供應商選擇決策。
除了技術類與管理類的文獻研討之外，本課程將包含個案研究、產業應用及ERP的系統實習，介紹存貨管理、採購及外包相關經營管理的前瞻思維與系統操作，以達到實務與理論的平衡訓練。“
goal.en: Our students will comprehend discipline-related economics/management knowledge in Inventory management and procurement.

N/AIntroduction to SAP S/4 Hanna (ECC6.0 – R/3) MM module SAP 物流系統之物料模組(MM)簡介
Material flow in SC and inventory classifications SC物料流和庫存分類
Role of inventory in an economic system ＆ KPI: Turnover rate versus Margin  庫存在經濟體系中的作用 ＆ KPI：周轉率與獲利率
Inventory cost 庫存成本
Inventory position 庫存位置
ABC analysis and control ABC分析和控制
Introduction to inventory decision models
Economic order quantity (EOQ) (Reorder-based planning)
Economic production quantity (EPQ)
Fixed period model (Time-phase planning)
Quantity discount (Part 2-2)
MRP replenishment ＆ lot-sizing (2-3)
Dynamic model (Forecasting-based planning)

textbook.ch:

2 EA Silver, DF Pyke, and R Peterson (1998), Inventory Management and Production Planning and Scheduling
3 學術期刊(Management Science, Operations Research, Interface, Harvard Business Review, Sloan Management Review等)相關文獻
Inventory mgmt ＆ procurement
1. Abernathy, FH, JT Dunlop, JH Hammond, and D Weil (2000), Control your inventory in a world of lean retailing, Harvard Business Review, November-December, 169-176.
2. Friend, SC and PH Walker (2001), Welcome to the new world of merchandising, Harvard Business Review, November, 133-141.
3. Callioni, G, X de Montgros, R Slagmulder, LN Van Wassenhove, and L Wright (2005), Inventory-driven costs, Harvard Business Review, March, 135-141.
4. Chopra, S and MA Lariviere (2005), Managing service inventory to improve performance, Sloan Management Review, Fall, Vol.47, No.1, 56-63.
5. Gottfredson, M, R Puryear, and S Phillips (2005), Strategic sourcing from periphery to the core, Harvard Business Review, February, 132-139.
6. Kraljic, P (1983), Purchasing must become supply management, Harvard Business Review, September-October, 109-117.
 
HBR forethought-INV. ＆ PROC.
1. Perkins, AG (1994), Maximizing service, minimizing inventory, Harvard Business Review, March-April, 13-14.
2. Conversation (2000), E-procurement at Schlumberger, Harvard Business Review, May-June, 21-22.
3. Degraeve, Z and F Roodhooft (2001), A smarter way to buy, Harvard Business Review, June, 22-23. 
4. Morales, DK and S Geary (2003), Speed kills: supply chain lessons from the war in Iraq, Harvard Business Review, November, 16-17.
5. Corsten, D and T Gruen (2004), Stock-outs cause walkouts, Harvard Business Review, May, pp 26, 28. 
6. Linder, JC (2005), Outsourcing integration, Harvard Business Review, June, p. 19.
7. Niezen, C and W Weller (2006), Procurement as strategy, Harvard Business Review, September, pp 22, 24.
8. McGoldrick, PJ and PM Barton (2007), High-tech ways to keep cupboards full, Harvard Business Review, March, 21-22.
9. Beck, A and C Peacock (2007), Lessons from the leaders of retail loss prevention, Harvard Business Review, November, p 34.
10. O’Connell, A (2007), Improve your return on returns, Harvard Business Review, November, pp 30, 34.
11. Amaral, J and G Parker (2008), Prevent disasters in design outsourcing, Harvard Business Review, September, pp 30, 34.
12. Davenport, T and B Iyer (2009), Should you outsource your brain? Harvard Business Review, February, p. 38.
13. O’Connell, A (2009), Using gifts and trees to make recyclers of Indian consumers, Harvard Business Review, September, p. 68.
  HBR forethought-Auction
14. Conversation (1999), Redesigning business, Harvard Business Review, November-December, 19-20.
15. van Heck, E (2000), The cutting edge in auctions, Harvard Business Review, March-April, 18-19.
16. Nunes, P, D Wilson, and A Kambil (2000), The all-in-one market, Harvard Business Review, May-June, 19-20.
17. Jap, S (2000), Going, going, gone, Harvard Business Review, November-December, p. 30.
18. McNealy, S (2001), Welcome to the bazaar, Harvard Business Review, March, 18-19.
19. Nissanoff, D (2006), Future shop, Harvard Business Review, March, p. 30.“
